content: Rugby club Herceg (Croatian: Ragbi klub Herceg) is an amateur rugby union club based in the city of Mostar, Bosnia and Herzegovina. The club was founded in 2011 by a group of friends which previously never had contact with rugby. It competes in national leagues of Bosnia and Herzegovina and regional league Adria 7s, of which they are co-founders. Their home ground is Stadion Raštani, located in place of the same name, Raštani, Mostar suburb.
